topic: Case studies of reverse problem-solving in the energy sector
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that approaching a problem backwards can uncover overlooked steps and simplify processes by starting with the desired outcome and identifying the necessary steps in reverse. The next step is to test this hypothesis by selecting a specific problem, such as a project management task, and applying a reverse problem-solving approach to see if it reveals any new insights or efficiencies. I will document the process and results to evaluate the effectiveness of this method in practice.

metadata.trigger: What would happen if I approached this problem backwards?
